field.label: Description
field.helptext: Describe this permission set's purpose for at-a-glance assignment.

skuid__text.contents: This permission set name is already in use
You haven't added data sources to this app
Data source objects are Skuid’s way of parsing database tables, and they are also used to determine field-level read/write access. Configure data source object permissions for each of the following.

Set permissions for the data source objects below. These permissions determine which read/write actions users can take on a data source object. 
If you need to makes changes to this data source, such as adding new objects or fields, save your work and navigate to the data source's detail screen.
You haven't imported any objects into this data source
You must save or cancel your permission changes to this data source object before navigating away.

enableConditions.message: You must save or cancel your permission changes to this data source object.

action.label: if there are data source objects
